title: vijayambikE
sahitya:
vijayAmbikE vimalAtmikE 

(vijayAmbikE)



anupallavi



ajavanditE amarEndranutE nija bhaktahitE nigamAndarkadE 

(vijayAmbikE)



caraNam



shruti svara grAma mUrcanAlankAra nAda janita rAga rasa bharita
sangIta rUpiNi gaurI pAlisau mAtE harikEsha manamOdini 
 

(vijayAmbikE)
